#summary Installation instructions
#labels Featured

= Prerequisites =

The *Eclipse XPS* plug-in requires:

  * Dell XPS laptop
  * Microsoft Windows XP (32 bit) with Eclipse 3.2 (or higher), or Microsoft Windows Vista (32 bit) with Eclipse 3.3 (or higher)
  * Dell !QuickSet
  * Java 1.4 (or higher)

= Installation Instructions =

  # Download the latest release from http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/downloads/list
  # Copy the downloaded JAR file into the 'plugins' directory of your Eclipse installation
  # (Re)Start Eclipse
